amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Army to implement the project for ecosystem restoration, Gwynns Falls, Maryland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1650 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1650 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S11539-11544) To direct the Secretary of the Army to implement the project for ecosystem restoration, Gwynns Falls, Maryland.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1650 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1650 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Sarbanes.
